TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CursorInteropHelper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a static helper class for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](../Token/TLA2%23tla_winclient_md.md)]/[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](../../add/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] interoperation with one method, which is used to obtain a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] object based on a provided [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] cursor handle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Input.Cursor Create(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle cursorHandle) cil managed

Docs.param: Cursor reference to use for interoperation.
Docs.summary: Returns a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] object based on a provided [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] cursor handle.
Docs.returns: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] cursor object based on the provided [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] cursor handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Setting a custom cursor image requires security permissions even if done in pure [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](../Token/TLA2%23tla_winclient_md.md)] programming. See <xref:System.Windows.Input.Cursor>.

Docs.permission: to call this method. Associated enumeration:
Docs.value: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] cursor object based on the provided [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] cursor handle.
